OpenSim.Services.MessagingService.RemoteAsyncMessagePostService Class Reference

This class deals with putting async messages into the regions 'queues' and sending them to them when they request them. This is used for Aurora.Server. More...

string Name [get]

Detailed Description

This class deals with putting async messages into the regions 'queues' and sending them to them when they request them. This is used for Aurora.Server.
